info.description:
SAKman Agent
============

|pipeline status|

|coverage report|

|JWT|

What is it?
-----------

***S**\ sh **A**\ uthorized **K**\ eys **man**\ ager*

| SAKman Agent is a client for SAKman Server.
| It serve the purpose of creating/updating ``~/.ssh/authorized_keys``

How to use it?
--------------

You have to fill the configuration file (see below) to connect to your
SAKman Server.

    .. rubric:: DEMO
       :name: demo

    | You can use the *DEMO APP* hosted on
      `Heroku <https://sakman.herokuapp.com%3E>`__
    | You will need this key: ``L2e4BTCTWQ5TDjYKuB8dzcyjpmCTSlgb``
    | User is: ``user@test.com:password``

Configuration file ``/etc/sakagent.cfg``
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::

    [agent]
    host =
    key =
    environment =

    [proxy]
    http =
    https =

Format between SAKman Agent and SAKman Server (decode)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code:: json

    {
      "environment": "rec",
      "users": [
        {"user1": {"email": "userkey1@test.com", "name": "userkey1", "pubkey": "laclepubliquedeuserkey1"}},
        {"user2": {"email": "userkey2@test.com", "name": "userkey2", "pubkey": "laclepubliquedeuserkey2"}}
        ],
        "pub_date": "2017-10-18T17:15:46.799689"
      }

.. |pipeline status| image:: http://git.lamethode.xyz/sakman/sakman-agent/badges/master/pipeline.svg
   :target: http://git.lamethode.xyz/sakman/sakman-agent/commits/master
.. |coverage report| image:: http://git.lamethode.xyz/sakman/sakman-agent/badges/master/coverage.svg
   :target: http://git.lamethode.xyz/sakman/sakman-agent/commits/master

   :target: https://jwt.io/
